class.name: ViewportSprite
class.brief_description: Displays a viewport as a sprite.
class.description: Used to display a [Viewport] node at some position in the world, without having to mess with [RenderTargetTexture]\ s.

method.name: get_modulate
method.description: Get color modulation for the texture. All texture pixels are multiplied by this color.

method.name: get_offset
method.description: get the offset to the origin of the texture.

method.name: get_viewport_path
method.description: Return the path to the shown [Viewport] node.

method.name: is_centered
method.description: Return whether the viewport's texture is centered on the origin.

method.name: set_centered
method.description: Set whether the viewport's texture should be centered on the origin.

method.name: set_modulate
method.description: Set color modulation for the texture. All texture pixels are multiplied by this color. Color may contain rgb values above 1 to achieve a highlight effect.

method.name: set_offset
method.description: Set the offset to the origin of the texture.

method.name: set_viewport_path
method.description: Set the path to the shown [Viewport] node.
